result.deskripsine:
Have you been wondering how to be a mob just like the zombie or creeper?
Well now, you can be a mob now using this addon.

 This addon makes you morph into mobs like pigs or cows.

How To MorphTo morph into any other mobs, you need an item called Soul Catcher.

 To be able to obtain the Soul Catcher, you need to find one in the chest of a Nether Fortress.

This Add-on allowed you to morph into 30 mobs from Minecraft.

Zombie, Husk, Dorwned, Zombie Pigman, Enderman, Skeleton, Stray, Creeper, Blaze, Cow, Pig, Sheep, Chicken, Spider, Iron Golem, Villager, Wolf, Cat, Bat, Slime, Snow Golem, Ghast, Vex, Bee, Horse, Witch, Axolotl, Shulker, Fox and all mobs in this Add-on have a full abilities

The More Mutant Creatures Mod adds 21 mutant creatures.

All of the mobs use customized mob models to provide a new and hopefully more scary experience.

All mobs spawn randomly in-game but they are quite rare to find.

It's a really fun mod to play around with and it even comes with a modded map.
